alert.note: Alert for La Salle; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:13PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern La Salle and west central McMullen Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Ewell Site, or 23 miles southeast of Cotulla, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern La Salle and west central McMullen Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
